```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(faraway)
library(RSQLite)
```

```{r}
ball <- dbConnect(drv = RSQLite::SQLite(), dbname = "database.sqlite")
```


```{r}
dbListTables(ball)
```

```{r}
dbListFields(ball, "hall_of_fame")
```
```{r}
debut <- dbGetQuery(ball, "SELECT *
                    FROM hall_of_fame")
debut
```


```{r}
player.data <- dbGetQuery(ball, "SELECT *
                   FROM player")
player.data
```

```{r}
batting <- dbGetQuery(ball, "SELECT *
                      FROM batting")
batting
```


```{r}
player.weight <- dbGetQuery(ball, "SELECT 703*(weight/(height)**2) as BMI
                            FROM player")
player.weight
```
```{r}
triples <- dbGetQuery(ball, "SELECT triple
                            FROM batting")
triples
```
